history.proof: intros x y z H1 H2; induction H1. - apply H2. - qsimpl use: star_S.

ctx: intros x y z H1 H2; induction H1.
exceptions.tactic: apply star_S with y; [apply H1 | apply IHstar; apply H2].
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X z, y, x, z0 : X H : R x y H1 : star R y z0 H2 : star R z0 z IHstar : star R z0 z -> star R y z Unable to unify "star R y z0" with "star R x y".

original: intros x y z H1 H2; induction H1. - apply H2. - apply star_S with y; [apply H1 | apply IHstar; apply H2].
